Title: libpng: Denial of service
Synopsis:
A vulnerability in libpng may allow a remote attacker to crash applications
    that handle untrusted images.

Background.Text: libpng is a free ANSI C library used to process and manipulate PNG images.

Description.Text: Mats Palmgren fixed an error in file pngrutil.c in which the trans[] array might be not allocated because of images with a bad tRNS chunk CRC value.

Impact.Text: A remote attacker could craft an image that when processed or viewed by an application using libpng causes the application to terminate abnormally.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text:
